Delete Text

All of the typical text editor ways of deleting text are also found in RText. First, select the text to delete. Then, do any of the following:

  1. Click on the Delete button on the Toolbar.
  2. Go to the Edit menu, then select Delete.
  3. Press Delete (or whatever shortcut you have defined for this action).
  4. Right-click in the current document, then select Delete from the popup menu.
